option.description: 111X External RC oscillator, CLKOUT function on RA6
option.name: RC

option.description: EC oscillator, CLKOUT function on OSC2 (low power, <500 kHz)
option.name: ECLP

option.description: EC oscillator, CLKOUT function on OSC2 (medium power, 500 kHz-16 MHz)
option.name: ECMP

option.description: Internal oscillator block, CLKOUT function on OSC2
option.name: INTIO7

option.description: External RC oscillator, CLKOUT function on OSC2
option.name: RC

option.description: EC oscillator, CLKOUT function on OSC2 (high power, >16 MHz)
option.name: ECHP

option.description: Primary clock can be disabled by software
option.name: OFF

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled in hardware only (SBOREN is disabled)
option.name: SBORDIS

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled in hardware only and disabled in Sleep mode (SBOREN is disabled)
option.name: NOSLP

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled and controlled by software (SBOREN is enabled)
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset disabled in hardware and software
option.name: OFF

option.description: WDT is always enabled. SWDTEN bit has no effect
option.name: ON

option.description: WDT is controlled by SWDTEN bit of the WDTCON register
option.name: SWON

option.description: WDT is disabled in sleep, otherwise enabled. SWDTEN bit has no effect
option.name: NOSLP

option.description: Watch dog timer is always disabled. SWDTEN has no effect.
option.name: OFF

option.description: CCP2 input/output is multiplexed with RC1
option.name: PORTC1

option.description: CCP2 input/output is multiplexed with RB3
option.name: PORTB3

option.description: PORTB<5:0> pins are configured as analog input channels on Reset
option.name: ON

option.description: PORTB<5:0> pins are configured as digital I/O on Reset
option.name: OFF

option.description: P3A/CCP3 input/output is multiplexed with RB5
option.name: PORTB5

option.description: P3A/CCP3 input/output is mulitplexed with RE0
option.name: PORTE0

option.description: HFINTOSC output and ready status are not delayed by the oscillator stable status
option.name: ON

option.description: HFINTOSC output and ready status are delayed by the oscillator stable status
option.name: OFF

option.description: MCLR pin enabled, RE3 input pin disabled
option.name: EXTMCLR

option.description: RE3 input pin enabled; MCLR disabled
option.name: INTMCLR

option.description: Stack full/underflow will not cause Reset
option.name: OFF

option.description: Single-Supply ICSP enabled if MCLRE is also 1
option.name: ON

option.description: Instruction set extension and Indexed Addressing mode enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Instruction set extension and Indexed Addressing mode disabled (Legacy mode)
option.name: OFF

option.description: Block 0 (000800-001FFFh) not protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: OFF

option.description: Block 0 (000800-001FFFh) protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: ON

option.description: Block 1 (002000-003FFFh) not protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: OFF

option.description: Block 1 (002000-003FFFh) protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: ON

setting.name: EBTRB
setting.description: Boot Block Table Read Protection bit

option.description: Boot Block (000000-0007FFh) not protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: OFF

option.description: Boot Block (000000-0007FFh) protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: ON
